name: Tanzir Ahmed Sami
heroIntro: I build clean, responsive, and user-focused full stack web applications with a strong engineering mindset.

paragraphs: My programming journey began from an engineering background, where I worked closely with industrial systems, automation, and real-world problem solving. Over time, I became deeply interested in building software systems that are not only functional but also intuitive and user-friendly.

I currently focus on web development using modern technologies, especially the MERN stack. I enjoy turning ideas into responsive interfaces, structuring data-driven applications, and improving user experience through clean design and logical workflows.

Outside of programming, I enjoy competitive gaming, learning new technologies, and experimenting with system-level tools. These interests help me stay curious, analytical, and constantly motivated to improve.
